text:
Thanks <@U7SL518D6>! I'm however getting this after my files are done uploading, is this a local problem to me or HubSpot specific?
HubSpotHttpError: The post in account *** was bad. Cannot construct instance of `com.HubSpot.content.fonts.core.FontMeta`, problem: Cannot build FontMeta, some of required attributes are not set [fallback] (line:19, column:3)

That’s a strange error. *Does FontMeta ring any bells for you? I’m wondering if maybe you have additional steps in your workflow other than the GH action.*

The GH Action uses HubSpot’s CLI under the hood. I’m looking at our CLI dependencies and not seeing that. Additionally as a CLI tool it doesn’t really make sense for us to have any dependencies related to fonts since the CLI has no control over that.
